AI-Powered Memory Camera: A camera that uses artificial intelligence to learn and recognize faces, objects, and events, allowing users to easily organize and search their photos.
Virtual Reality Camera: A camera that allows users to capture and share immersive virtual reality experiences.
Smell-O-Vision Camera: A camera that captures and recreates scents through photos.
Time-Traveling Camera: A camera that allows users to capture and view photos from different time periods.
